name: Digicam Dark Theme
css: @-moz-document domain("dh.force.com"){*{color:#fff;transition:.3s all ease-in-out;font-size:16px}input,button{padding:0;border:0;color:#252525;background:#fff}input:focus,button:focus{outline:none}input[checked]+label{font-weight:bold;background-color:#607d8b;color:#000;padding-right:10px;margin-left:5px;border-radius:5px}textarea.questionInput{background:unset;border:2px solid rgba(100,100,100,.6);min-height:300px}textarea.questionInput:focus{border:2px solid #607d8b}a{color:#607d8b;cursor:pointer}a:hover{color:#607d8b}body{background:#252525}footer{display:none}td{word-break:break-word}.btnBack,.btnNext{cursor:pointer}.btnNext{font-weight:bold;background-color:#888}.btnNext:hover{background-color:#607d8b}#login h2{color:#888}#login input{color:#000}#login .loginLink{color:#fff;background:#252525}#login .loginLink a{color:#fff}#login .loginArea{background:#252525;border:3px solid #555;border-radius:10px;overflow:hidden}#login #header{color:#fff;background:#252525}#login .loginBtn{border:0;cursor:pointer}#commonHeader,aside,.threeQuestionsArea{background:rgba(100,100,100,.6)}.currentNew span{color:#000 !important}.tabelType01 th,.tabelType02 th{background:#555;border:2px #555 solid}.tabelType01 td:not(.toAll),.tabelType02 td:not(.toAll){background:#252525;border:2px #555 solid}tr:not([onclick]):hover a{color:#607d8b;background:rgba(100,100,100,.6)}tr[onclick]:hover td{color:#fff;background:rgba(100,100,100,.6)}#commonHeader,.threeQuestionsArea{background:#252525}.menuList,.menuBlock{border-bottom:3px solid #555;padding-top:0}.menuBlock~.menuBlock{padding-top:15px}.menuList>li>i a,.menuList>li a,.navCategoryList a{color:#fff;font-size:16px}.menuList>li p{display:none}.menuList>li a::before{background:linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, #9e9e9e);width:8px;border:0;height:8px;margin-right:15px;box-shadow:0 0 5px #252525}.currentNew span{color:#000 !important}#gnav{border-radius:10px;background:#2f2f2f}#gnav a{text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden;white-space:pre}#gnav a:not(.current):hover{color:#fff;background:rgba(100,100,100,.6)}#gnav .current{color:#fff;text-shadow:0 0 5px #555;font-weight:bold;background-color:#607d8b}#gnav .current:hover{background-color:#607d8b}#gnav .current,#gnav a{border-radius:5px}#gnav .current:hover,#gnav a:hover{transform:translateX(5px)}.wrapper{overflow:visible;margin-top:30px;display:flex;padding:0 10px;box-sizing:border-box;justify-content:space-between}.navCategoryList{text-indent:0}aside{width:auto;background:#252525;padding:10px;box-shadow:0 0 10px #111}#mainContents{width:auto;padding:0 10px;margin:0 10px}.question1to3{padding:5px 10px;font-size:18px;background:rgba(100,100,100,.6);border-radius:5px}.homeNewsBox{padding-top:0;margin-bottom:70px}.homeNewsBox>input{background:#555;color:#e0e0e0 !important}.homeNewsBox .cateTtl{background-image:linear-gradient(to right, #607d8b, #9e9e9e);text-shadow:0 0 10px #666;padding:10px;font-size:22px;border-radius:10px;width:-webkit-fill-available;width:-moz-available;margin-bottom:15px}.homeNewsBox tr a.showList{color:#fff;font-size:16px;border-radius:5px}.homeNewsBox tr a.showList:hover{color:#fff;background:rgba(100,100,100,.6)}}@-moz-document url-prefix("https://dh.force.com/digitalCampus/CampusDeliveryList?displayType=106"){.classAnnounce .tabelType01{border-bottom:2px #555 solid}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 .tableWide4_1{width:100px}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 tbody{padding-top:2rem;display:flex;position:relative;flex-direction:column-reverse}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 tbody tr{display:inline-table}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 tbody tr:first-child{width:100%;height:2rem;position:absolute;top:0;left:0}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 tbody tr:not(:first-child) td{border-bottom:0}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 tbody tr+tr td:nth-child(1){width:100px}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 tbody tr+tr td:nth-child(3){width:45px}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 tbody tr+tr td:nth-child(4){width:80px}.classAnnounce .tabelType01 tbody tr+tr td:last-child{width:55px}}/*# sourceMappingURL=style.css.map */
